thread.title: Trevor Noah Lets Trump Aide Stephen Miller Eviscerate Himself
thread.title_full: Trevor Noah Lets Trump Aide Stephen Miller Eviscerate Himself

author: David Moye
title: Trevor Noah Lets Trump Aide Stephen Miller Eviscerate Himself
text:
COMEDY Trevor Noah Lets Trump Aide Stephen Miller Eviscerate Himself “It’s nice to see, like most of your friends from high school, not only has Miller not changed, he’s gotten worse.” 02/14/2017 01:01 am ET David Moye Reporter, The Huffington Post 
Stephen Miller is supposed to be Donald Trump ’s senior policy adviser, but you’d think his real employers were late-night comedians. 
Miller did such a terrible job on the Sunday morning political shows that all Noah pretty much had to do on “The Daily Show” on Monday was show clips of the Trump aide in action. 
Noah did point out that Miller was the most hated kid in his high school class because he made fun of minorities, despised the fact there was a club for gay students on campus and refused to pick up trash because that was the janitor’s job. 
“It’s nice to see, like most of your friends from high school, not only has Miller not changed, he’s gotten worse,” Noah said. 
Noah also pointed out that if Miller looks familiar, there’s a good reason: “It’s probably because you see him every time you take off your socks.” Comedy Central
